Name: Language
Description: Specifies the language (and optionally the locale) of the individual. The language identifier is defined by IETF RFC 4646 or its successor. The base sub-tag is the ISO 639 2 or 3 digit language code.

Name: Read
Description: Indicates reading knowledge of the language specified. Supports an optional controlled vocabulary.

Name: Write
Description: Indicates writing knowledge of the language specified. Supports an optional controlled vocabulary.

Name: Speak
Description: Indicates speaking knowledge of the language specified. Supports an optional controlled vocabulary.

Name: EffectivePeriod
Description: Clarifies when the identification information is accurate.
